com.ftpos.library.smartpos.keymanager

Interface KeyType


  • public interface KeyType
    Copyright (C), 2015-2020,FEITIAN Technologies Co., Ltd. All rights reserved. Key type definitions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int KEY_TYPE_BDK
      The key type is bdk key, used to generate ipek.
      static int KEY_TYPE_DEK
      The key type is Session Key, used to encrypt data.
      static int KEY_TYPE_FIXEDKEY
      The key type is Fixed Key.
      static int KEY_TYPE_IPEK
      The key type is IPEK.
      static int KEY_TYPE_KBPK
      The key type is KBPK, used to protect the TR31 data block.
      static int KEY_TYPE_MEK
      The key type is Session key, used to calculate MAC (Response mode).
      static int KEY_TYPE_MK
      The key type is Master Key.
      static int KEY_TYPE_PEK
      The key type is Session Key, used to encrypt PIN.
      static int KEY_TYPE_RSA
      The key type is RSA.
